availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Boyd County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Martha A. Spurlock. Father of Strother, Goble, Susan M., Virginia C., Charity C., Pamelia F., Martha R., George, William, and Catherine Burgess. Farmer in Boyd County, Kentucky in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Boyd County, Catlettsburg post office, p. 13.
Find A Grave, Entry for George R. Burgess (1813-1900), Find A Grave Memorial # 122825171, Buchanan Chapel Cemetery, Zelda, Lawrence County, Kentucky, https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/122825171 (accessed 11 May 2017).
